page.title: 17Royal Darroch Hotel 3
page.content: In the official enquiry into the disaster it was agreed that if precautions had been taken the blast may not have happened. Mrs Parish who lived across the road phoned the fire brigade from her house two hundred yards away.She had thought that her house had been hit by a truck or somethng.People nearby could hear screams from people downstairs who were trapped because there was no stair way.The fire started when a man went down into the basement to get a hoover.All the meters underneath had burst and when the man opened the door the air met with the gas and exploded.Scottish gas admitted there was a connection with the explosion and a gas man who suffered great shock while working with gas pipes at the time of the explosion.
